message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. It's worth at least $10,000 to me, and I'm confident it will be even more valuable to you.  I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,500. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I understand its value to you, but I'm hoping to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would you be willing to consider $11,000 for the product?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to go down to $11,250. It's a fair price considering the product's value, and it allows both of us to get a good deal. What do you say?
